<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComInput" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image id="bg" source="square_png" x="0" y="0" />
    <e:Label id="word" text="紧" anchorOffsetX="32.5" anchorOffsetY="32.5" textColor="0xdc862c" horizontalCenter="0"
             verticalCenter="0" size="92" fontFamily="SimHei" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComSelection" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="con" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="53" anchorOffsetY="53">
		<e:Image id="bg" source="square_png" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" anchorOffsetX="65.5" anchorOffsetY="65.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="bg_selected" source="click_png" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" anchorOffsetX="65.5" anchorOffsetY="65.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="word" text="锦" anchorOffsetX="33.5" anchorOffsetY="33.5" textColor="0x90170e" fontFamily="SimHei" size="67" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComEmpty" width="200" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComBubble" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*"
        xmlns:item="item.*">
	<e:Group id="con" x="0" y="0" width="335" height="100">
		<e:Group id="conWord" width="335" anchorOffsetX="148" anchorOffsetY="-20" height="100" x="148" y="-20" scaleX="1"
		         scaleY="1">
			<e:Image id="bgDebug" source="pHelpMe_png" height="120" anchorOffsetX="167.5" anchorOffsetY="50" horizontalCenter="0"
			         width="335" y="50" rotation="180" scale9Grid="37,28,7,6" />
			<e:Image id="bgWord" source="pHelpMe_png" height="120" anchorOffsetX="167.5" anchorOffsetY="50" horizontalCenter="0"
			         scale9Grid="37,28,7,6" width="335" y="50" rotation="0" />
			<e:Image id="word" source="lang_guide_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComFloat" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*">
	<e:Group id="con" x="60.5" y="15" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15">
		<e:Group id="conFloat" x="60.5" y="15" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15">
			<e:Image id="float" anchorOffsetX="60.5" anchorOffsetY="15"
			          source="pBGspray_png" x="60.5" y="15"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComGuide" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:com="com.*">
	<e:Image id="hand"  x="49" y="7" anchorOffsetX="49" anchorOffsetY="7" source="hand_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComLight" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="285" height="285">
	<e:Group id="con" x="0" y="0" width="285" height="285">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="warn" anchorOffsetX="35" anchorOffsetY="77" x="160" y="128" source="p_zhiyin1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ComProgress" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="con" y="0" x="0">
		<e:Group id="conBar">
			<e:Image source="icon3_wait_png"/>
			<e:Image id="bar" x="0" y="0" source="icon4_wait_png"/>
		</e:Group>

	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.GameScene" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"
        xmlns:com="com.*" width="750" height="1334">
	<w:Config id="1699015f821" />
	<e:Image id="bg" source="BG_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>

	<e:Group id="out_con" anchorOffsetX="375" width="750" anchorOffsetY="0" height="1155" horizontalCenter="1" y="177">
		<e:Group id="pic_con" width="694.33" height="386" y="223" anchorOffsetX="347.16" anchorOffsetY="193" x="375.16"/>
		<e:Group id="con" width="590" height="682" y="786" anchorOffsetX="295" anchorOffsetY="341" x="376">
			<e:Group id="input_con" width="590" height="134" y="68" anchorOffsetX="295" anchorOffsetY="67" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="295">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="22" horizontalAlign="center"/>
			</e:layout>
			<com:ComInput id="input0" x="162" y="62" skinName="skins.ComInput"/>
			<com:ComInput x="172" y="72" id="input1" skinName="skins.ComInput"/>
			<com:ComInput x="182" y="82" id="input2" skinName="skins.ComInput"/>
			<com:ComInput x="192" y="92" id="input3" skinName="skins.ComInput"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Image id="line" source="line_png" y="154" horizontalCenter="0" scaleX="0"/>
			<e:Group id="words_con" width="590" height="504" y="429" anchorOffsetX="295" anchorOffsetY="252" x="295" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:layout>
				<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="15" verticalGap="15"/>
			</e:layout>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_0" x="100" y="83" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_1" x="110" y="93" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_2" x="120" y="103" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_3" x="130" y="113" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_4" x="140" y="123" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_5" x="150" y="133" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_6" x="160" y="143" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_7" x="170" y="153" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_8" x="180" y="163" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_9" x="190" y="173" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_10" x="200" y="183" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_11" x="210" y="193" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_12" x="220" y="203" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_13" x="230" y="213" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_14" x="240" y="223" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_15" x="250" y="233" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_16" x="260" y="243" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_17" x="270" y="253" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_18" x="280" y="263" width="105" height="105"/>
			<com:ComSelection id="selection_19" x="290" y="273" width="105" height="105"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="end_con" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Group anchorOffsetX="216.5" width="433" anchorOffsetY="66.5" height="133" verticalCenter="290" horizontalCenter="0.5">
			<e:Image id="end_btn" source="button_png" anchorOffsetX="226.5" anchorOffsetY="47" x="216.5" y="67" visible="false"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-150" anchorOffsetX="272.5" anchorOffsetY="272.5" width="545" height="545">
			<e:Image id="end_logo" source="icon_png" anchorOffsetX="272.5" anchorOffsetY="272.5" y="272.5" x="272.5" visible="false"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="132" anchorOffsetX="318" anchorOffsetY="91.5">
			<e:Image id="end_title" source="word4_png" anchorOffsetX="318" anchorOffsetY="91.5" x="318" y="91.5" visible="false"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>




	<!--<e:Group id="conParticles" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false">
	</e:Group>-->

	<!--<e:Group id="conFloat" x="0" width="100%" height="82%" bottom="0">
	<e:Rect id="floatDebug" width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0x00ff00" fillAlpha="0.3" x="0" y="0" visible="false" />
</e:Group>
-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiPass" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="bg" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
	<e:Group id="pass_con" width="750" height="1334" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Group id="moon_con" x="375" y="531">
			<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="text_con" x="0" y="760">
			<e:Group id="congrasts_con" width="750" anchorOffsetY="0" height="186" y="0" x="0">
			<e:Image id="congrats" source="word2_png" anchorOffsetX="348" anchorOffsetY="126" horizontalCenter="0" y="93" visible="false"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Label id="explain" text="" width="568" anchorOffsetY="0" height="219.76" strokeColor="0xb57211" stroke="1" size="35" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetX="0" x="91" y="261.24"/>
			<e:Image id="btn" source="word3_png" x="156" y="453"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiStart" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="bg" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
	<e:Group id="chat" x="375.5" y="667.5" anchorOffsetX="374.5" anchorOffsetY="223.5">
		<e:Image source="guideframe_png" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="btn" source="word1_png" x="282.5" y="376"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiEmpty" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.UiFirst" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<!--<e:Rect id="bg" width="750" height="150" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x2f3651" fillAlpha="0.5" />-->
	<e:Group id="conLogo" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="0" x="0">
		<e:Group id="gLogo" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2">
			<e:Image id="logo" source="logo_png" x="177" y="57" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" anchorOffsetX="177" anchorOffsetY="57"/>

		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="conBtn" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="300" x="0">
		<e:Group id="gBtn" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
			<e:Image id="btn" source="button_png" x="183.13" y="14.25" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" anchorOffsetX="183.13" width="366.26" anchorOffsetY="38" height="76"/>


		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
